timeline.message:
Migrate all bValues' stringValue implementations

timeline.bodyText: don't use explicit default keyword. is there is a reason for this?
timeline.author: manuranga

replies.bodyText: It was already there. I just removed the public keyword because it is useless to have in an interface method.
replies.author: riyafa
